titles: The gouernment of health: a treatise written by William Bullein, for the especiall good and healthfull preseruation of mans bodie from all noysome diseases, proceeding by the excesse of euill diet, and other infirmities of nature: full of excellent medicines, and wise counsels, for conseruation of health, in men, women, and children. Both pleasant and profitable to the industrious reader
author: Bullein, William, d. 1576.
publisher: Printed by Valentine Sims dwelling in Adling street, at the signe of the white Swan, neare Bainards castel,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
